content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Research Lab at position(10.5, 10.5)
- Lab with 10 automation science packs inserted, currently researching automation technology
- Currently unpowered

###Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-10.0, -59.0)
Large mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (-10.0, -59.0), (-8.0, -59.0), (-6.0, -59.0) mining iron ore
- Multiple wooden chests storing iron ore and plates at positions (-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting the components
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between components

###Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at position(-28.0, -61.0)
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0) mining copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -58.0) for smelting
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5) storing copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-24.5, -58.5) storing copper plates
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between components

###Iron Plate Production Line at position(0.0, 0.0)
Series of 4 stone furnaces at:
- (0.0, 0.0)
- (2.0, 0.0)
- (4.0, 0.0)
- (6.0, 0.0)
With associated wooden chests and burner inserters for input/output handling

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure you have crafted and have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it
- Check inventory contents before placement attempts

### Power-related errors
- Labs require electricity to function
- Set up power generation (steam engines, boilers) before placing power-dependent entities

### Transport belt blocking errors
- Clear blocked transport belts at positions (2.5, 4.5), (4.5, 4.5), and (6.5, 4.5)
- Ensure proper item flow and prevent belt backup by managing downstream processes

### Fuel-related errors
- Keep burner inserters supplied with fuel (coal)
- Monitor fuel levels in burner entities to prevent work stoppage

### Space and positioning errors
- Ensure destination has space before attempting item insertion
- Check if output paths are clear before initiating item transfers
